00022 define('DAY', 24 * HOUR);
00023 define('WEEK', 7 * DAY);
00024 define('MONTH', 30 * DAY);
00025 define('YEAR', 365 * DAY);

00036 /**
00037  * include the baseclass of whatever a model or controller is derived from.
00038  * this happens only once per request, so the penalty of using __autoload is small.
00039  *
00040  * @param string $cname classname
00041  */
00042 function kataAutoloader($cname) {
00043              $cname = strtolower($cname);
00044              switch ($cname) {
00045                           case 'appmodel' :
00046                                        if (file_exists(ROOT . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php')) {
00047                                                     require (ROOT . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php');
00048                                        } else {
00049                                                     require (LIB . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php');
00050                                        }
00051                                        break;
00052 
00053                           case 'appcontroller' :
00054                                        if (file_exists(ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php')) {
00055                                                     require (ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php');
00056                                        } else {
00057                                                     require (LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php');
00058                                        }
00059                                        break;
00060 
00061                           case 'scaffoldcontroller' :
00062                                        require (LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'scaffold_controller.php');
00063                                        break;
00064 
00065                           case 'cachecontroller':
00066                                        require(LIB.'controllers'.DS.'cache_controller.php');
00067                                        break;
00068 
00069                           case 'memcache' :
00070                                        break;
00071 
00072                           default :
00073                                        if (substr($cname, -9, 9) == 'component') {
00074                                                     $cname = substr($cname,0,-9);
00075                                                     if (file_exists(LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00076                                                                  require LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00077                                                                  break;
00078                                                     }
00079                                                     require ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00080                                                     break;
00081                                        }
00082                                        if (substr($cname, -6, 6) == 'helper') {
00083                                                     $cname = substr($cname,0,-6);
00084                                                     if (file_exists(LIB . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00085                                                                  require LIB . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00086                                                                  break;
00087                                                     }
00088                                                     require ROOT . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00089                                                     break;
00090                                        }
00091                                        if (substr($cname, -7, 7) == 'utility') {
00092                                                     if (file_exists(LIB . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00093                                                                  require (LIB . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php');
00094                                                                  break;
00095                                                     }
00096                                                     require (ROOT . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php');
00097                                                     break;
00098                                        }
00099                                        if (file_exists(LIB . $cname . '.php')) {
00100                                                     kataUse($cname);
00101                                                     break;
00102                                        }
00103                                        break;
00104              }
00105 }
00106 spl_autoload_register('kataAutoloader');

00108 /**
00109  * print out type and content of the given variable if DEBUG-define (in config/core.php) > 0
00110  * @param mixed $var     Variable to debug
00111  * @param boolean $escape  If set to true variables content will be html-escaped
00112  */
00113 function debug($var = false, $escape = false) {
00114              if (DEBUG > 0) {
00115                           $var = var_export($var, true);
00116                           if ($escape) {
00117                                        $var = htmlspecialchars($var);
00118                           }
00119                           kataDebugOutput($var);
00120              }
00121 }
00122 
00123 /**
00124  * internal function to send kata debug info to the browser. just define your own function if you want firebug or something like it
00125  */
00126 if (!function_exists('kataDebugOutput')) {
00127              /**
00128               * @ignore
00129               * @param mixed $var variable to dump
00130               * @param bool $isTable if variable is an array we use a table to display each line
00131               */
00132              function kataDebugOutput($var = null, $isTable = false) {
00133                           if (DEBUG < 2) {
00134                                        return;
00135                           }
00136                           if ($isTable) {
00137                                        echo '<table style="border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;">';
00138                                        foreach ($var as $row) {
00139                                                     echo '<tr>';
00140                                                     foreach ($row as $col) {
00141                                                                  echo '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">' . $col . '</td>';
00142                                                     }
00143                                                     echo '</tr>';
00144                                        }
00145                                        echo '</table>';
00146                           } else {
00147                                        echo '<pre style="border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;padding:3px;">' . $var . '</pre>';
00148                           }
00149              }
00150 }

00152 /**
00153  * return the shortend path of the file currently begin executed
00154  * @return string
00155  */
00156 function kataGetLineInfo() {
00157              return;
00158              $nestLevel = -1;
00159              $bt = debug_backtrace();
00160              while ($nestLevel++ < count($bt)) {
00161                           if (empty ($bt[$nestLevel]['file']))
00162                                        continue;
00163                           foreach (array (
00164                                                     LIB,
00165                                                     ROOT . 'utilities' . DS
00166                                        ) as $test) {
00167                                        if (substr($bt[$nestLevel]['file'], 0, strlen($test)) == $test)
00168                                                     continue 2;
00169                           }
00170                           break;
00171              }
00172              return basename($bt[$nestLevel]['file']) . ':' . $bt[$nestLevel]['line'];
00173 }
00174 
00175 /**
00176  * return stacktrace-like information about the given variable
00177  * @return string
00178  */
00179 function kataGetValueInfo($val) {
00180              if (is_null($val)) {
00181                           return 'null';
00182              }
00183              if (is_array($val)) {
00184                           return 'array[' . count($val) . ']';
00185              }
00186              if (is_bool($val)) {
00187                           return ($val ? 'true' : 'false');
00188              }
00189              if (is_float($val) || is_int($val) || is_long($val) || is_real($val)) {
00190                           return 'num:' . $val;
00191              }
00192              if (is_string($val)) {
00193                           return 'string[' . strlen($val) . ']=' . substr($val, 0, 16);
00194              }
00195              if (is_resource($val)) {
00196                           return 'resource' . get_resource_type($val);
00197              }
00198              if (is_object($val)) {
00199                           return 'object';
00200              }
00201              return '?';
00202 }
00203 
00204 /**
00205  * Recursively strips slashes from all values in an array
00206  * @param mixed $value
00207  * @return mixed
00208  */
00209 function stripslashes_deep($value) {
00210              if (is_array($value)) {
00211                           return array_map('stripslashes_deep', $value);
00212              } else {
00213                           return stripslashes($value);
00214              }
00215 }

00217 /**
00218  * create a directory in TMPPATH and check if its writable
00219  */
00220 function kataMakeTmpPath($dirname) {
00221              if (!file_exists(KATATMP.$dirname.DS)) {
00222                           if (!mkdir(KATATMP.$dirname,0770,true)) {
00223                                        throw new Exception("kataMakeTmpPath: cant create temporary path $dirname");
00224                           }
00225              }
00226              if (!is_writable(KATATMP.$dirname)) {
00227                           throw new Exception("kataMakeTmpPath: ".KATATMP."$dirname is not writeable");
00228              }
00229 }
00230 
00231 /**
00232  * Recursively urldecodes all values in an array
00233  * @param mixed $value
00234  * @return mixed
00235  */
00236 function urldecode_deep($value) {
00237              if (is_array($value)) {
00238                           return array_map('urldecode_deep', $value);
00239              } else {
00240                           return urldecode($value);
00241              }
00242 }

00244 /** write a string to the log in KATATMP/logs
00245  *@param string $what string to write to the log
00246  *@param int $where log-level to log (default: KATA_DEBUG)
00247  */
00248 function writeLog($what, $where = KATA_DEBUG) {
00249              if ((DEBUG < 0) && (KATA_DEBUG == $where)) {
00250                           return;
00251              }
00252 
00253              $logname = 'error';
00254              if (KATA_DEBUG == $where) {
00255                           $logname = 'debug';
00256              }
00257              elseif (KATA_PANIC == $where) {
00258                           $logname = 'panic';
00259              }
00260 
00261 
00262              kataMakeTmpPath('logs');
00263              $h = fopen(KATATMP. 'logs' . DS . $logname . '.log', 'a');
00264              if ($h) {
00265                           fwrite($h, date('d.m.Y H:i ') . $what . "\n");
00266                           fclose($h);
00267              }
00268 }

00270 /**
00271  * include all neccessary classes and the given model
00272  * @param string model name without .php - if null it just loads all needed classes
00273  */
00274 function loadModel($name) {
00275              if (file_exists(ROOT . 'models' . DS . strtolower($name) . '.php')) {
00276                           require (ROOT . 'models' . DS . strtolower($name) . '.php');
00277                           return;
00278              }
00279              throw new Exception('basics: loadModel: cant find Model [' . $name . ']');
00280 }

00282 /**
00283  * return a handle to the given model. loads and initializes the model if needed.
00284  * @param string $value model name (without .php)
00285  * @return object
00286  */
00287 function getModel($name) {
00288              if (!class_exists($name)) {
00289                           loadModel($name);
00290              }
00291              $o = classRegistry :: getObject($name);
00292              return $o;
00293 }

00295 /**
00296  * return class-handle of a utility-class
00297  *
00298  * @param string $name name of the utility
00299  * @return object class-handle
00300  */
00301 function getUtil($name) {
00302              $classname = $name . 'Utility';
00303              if (!class_exists($classname)) {
00304                           require (ROOT . 'utilities' . DS . strtolower($classname) . '.php');
00305              }
00306              return classRegistry :: getObject($classname);
00307 }

00309 /**
00310  * Gets an environment variable from available sources.
00311  * Used as a backup if $_SERVER/$_ENV are disabled.
00312  *
00313  * @param  string $key Environment variable name.
00314  * @return string Environment variable setting.
00315  */
00316 function env($key) {
00317              if ($key == 'HTTPS') {
00318                           if (isset ($_SERVER) && !empty ($_SERVER)) {
00319                                        return (isset ($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on');
00320                           } else {
00321                                        return (strpos(env('SCRIPT_URI'), 'https://') === 0);
00322                           }
00323              }
00324 
00325              if (isset ($_SERVER[$key])) {
00326                           return $_SERVER[$key];
00327              }
00328              elseif (isset ($_ENV[$key])) {
00329                           return $_ENV[$key];
00330              }
00331              elseif (getenv($key) !== false) {
00332                           return getenv($key);
00333              }
00334 
00335              if ($key == 'DOCUMENT_ROOT') {
00336                           $offset = 0;
00337                           if (!strpos(env('SCRIPT_NAME'), '.php')) {
00338                                        $offset = 4;
00339                           }
00340                           return substr(env('SCRIPT_FILENAME'), 0, strlen(env('SCRIPT_FILENAME')) - (strlen(env('SCRIPT_NAME')) + $offset));
00341              }
00342              if ($key == 'PHP_SELF') {
00343                           return r(env('DOCUMENT_ROOT'), '', env('SCRIPT_FILENAME'));
00344              }
00345              return null;
00346 }

00348 /**
00349  * merge any number of arrays
00350  * @param array first array
00351  * @param array second array and so on
00352  * @return array the merged array
00353  */
00354 function am() {
00355              $result = array ();
00356              foreach (func_get_args() as $arg) {
00357                           if (!is_array($arg)) {
00358                                        $arg = array (
00359                                                     $arg
00360                                        );
00361                           }
00362                           $result = array_merge($result, $arg);
00363              }
00364              return $result;
00365 }

00367 /**
00368  * load files from the from LIB-directory
00369  * @param string filename without .php
00370  */
00371 function kataUse() {
00372              $args = func_get_args();
00373              foreach ($args as $arg) {
00374                           require_once (LIB . strtolower($arg) . '.php');
00375              }
00376 }

00378 /**
00379  * loads the given files in the VENDORS directory if not already loaded
00380  * @param string $name Filename without the .php part.
00381  */
00382 function vendor($name) {
00383              $args = func_get_args();
00384              foreach ($args as $arg) {
00385                           if (file_exists(ROOT . 'vendors' . DS . $arg . '.php')) {
00386                                        require_once (ROOT . 'vendors' . DS . $arg . '.php');
00387                           }
00388              }
00389 }

00391 /**
00392  * Convenience method for htmlspecialchars. you should use this instead of echo to avoid xss-exploits
00393  * @param string $text
00394  * @return string
00395  */
00396 function h($text) {
00397              if (is_array($text)) {
00398                           return array_map('h', $text);
00399              }
00400              return htmlspecialchars($text);
00401 }

00403 /**
00404  * convenience method to check if given value is set. if so, value is return, otherwise the default
00405  * @param mixed $arg value to check
00406  * @param mixed $default value returned if $value is unset
00407  */
00408 function is(& $arg, $default = null) {
00409              if (isset ($arg)) {
00410                           return $arg;
00411              }
00412              return $default;
00413 }
